1.speaker: A
sentence: You didn't come out great in this picture.

2.speaker: B
sentence: To be honest, I'm a little camera-shy.
솔직히, 나는 좀 사진 찍히기 싫어해요.

3.speaker: A
sentence: You look better then your picture.

5.speaker: A
sentence: You'd better change your mind and have confidence.
너 하는게 좋겠어 너의 마음을 바꾸고 자신감을 가지는게

6.speaker: B
sentence: On second thought, You have a point.
다시 생각해 보니, 너가 맞는 것 같다.
